title: Bloomwell Competitor Analysis

executive_summary.top_insight: The Kosten & Kostenübernahme page now shows a transparent cost table for recipe requests, video consultations, in-person appointments and follow-up prescriptions. A Friends referral programme offers escalating discounts (10%-100%) for recommending up to five friends.
executive_summary.immediate_implication: These changes aim to build trust and drive adoption. Detailed pricing removes a barrier for new patients, and referral rewards encourage viral growth.

referral_programme.name: Freunde werben Freunde
referral_programme.description: A new referral programme incentivises users to invite friends. For every referred friend who requests a prescription or completes a consultation, the user receives escalating discounts.

in_person_appointments.description: Bloomwell offers a physical, in-person consultation at the doctor's office as an alternative to online appointments. This option allows patients to meet the doctor face-to-face for their initial medical cannabis consultation.

funnel_and_ux.observed_delta: Full website redesign. Added trust bar with rotating USPs. New trust-focused hero. Product carousel to push fast funnel entry. Users can see available stock BEFORE the medical questionnaire. Funnel order: Sign up → Choose flower → Questionnaire → Payment.
funnel_and_ux.user_impact: Lower friction, faster understanding, higher trust
funnel_and_ux.business_impact: Higher funnel entry and faster conversion

product_and_pricing.observed_delta: Added in-person doctor appointment at clinic (€71.08, ~30 min). Online and physical options shown clearly. Expanded referral program (10%, 20%, 30%, 100% free consult). Prices visible early.
product_and_pricing.user_impact: More choice, clearer pricing, strong referral incentive
product_and_pricing.business_impact: Larger addressable audience, higher retention and organic growth

marketing_and_copy.observed_delta: Strong trust-first messaging (legal, medical, safe). New symptom/condition section linking to dedicated pages (mainly educational).

technology.observed_delta: Added Shop tab selling Bloomwell-branded cannabis accessories in one place

strategic_implications: Transparency wins: Detailed pricing up-front builds trust and reduces friction
Referral incentives: Strong viral growth mechanism with meaningful rewards
Multi-channel approach: In-person option expands addressable market
Accessory monetization: Additional revenue stream through branded products
Educational content: Symptom-based pages improve SEO and trust
